mapper.select: select no, subject, userid, hit, to_char(writedate, 'MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from board order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(no, subject, content, ip, userid) values(boardsq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select no, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate from board where no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{param2}, content=#{param3} where no=#{param1} and userid=#{param4}
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
